name: Elementum (itch) (Shiro Katake (Khang Gia Trinh))
description:
A small platformer game revolves around using your elemental powers to manipulate the environment.

Team:

  • Programmer: Khang Trinh, Conor Fitton
  • Artist: Aidan
  • Level designer: Laura Barberio, Jake Trenton
  • Music: Ketsa - Nature Shuffle https://www.freemusicarchive.org/music/Ketsa/Above_and_Below/Nature_Shuffle_1789
